page.title: 07MY SCHOOL DAY - COMMONSIDE
page.content: I GO TO TEVIOTHEAD PRIMARY SCHOOL. THERE ARE 17 CHILDREN THERE. THE SCHOOL HAS ONLY FIVE ROOMS. OUR TEACHER COMES FROM HAWICK ON THE BUS WHICH PICKS UP THE CHILDREN WHO LIVE MORE THAN 2 MILES AWAY. SCHOOL STARTS AT 8.30. MORNING BREAK IS 10.00-1O.15, LUNCH FROM 11.45-12.30. WE GO HOME AT 14.30. LUNCH COSTS 48P. IT'S A ONE COURSE MEAL WHICH COMES BY MINIBUS FROM DRUMLANRIG SCHOOL IN HAWICK. THAT'S THE SCHOOL WE GO TO AFTER PRIMARY 5. A MUSIC TEACHER COMES ONCE A WEEK, SO DOES A SPEECH THERAPIST. AN ART TEACHER COMES FORTNIGHTLY. WE ALL GO TO HAWICK ON A THURSDAY MORNING FOR P.E. AT DRUMLANRIG SCHOOL THEN A SWIMMING LESSON AT WILTON SCHOOL. MY SISTER TRAVELS TO HAWICK HIGH SCHOOL, 11 MILES FROM HOME. SHE CATCHES THE BUS WITH 4 OTHERS FROM THIS AREA.
